attributes.action: Save Childrens heart surgery unit at Glenfield Hospital
attributes.additional_details: Following the safe and sustainability proposal, we are petitioning against the closure of the East Midlands Congenital Heart surgical unit based at Glenfield hospital  in Leicester.  This unit should remain open  to continue the crucial life saving heart surgeries with congenital heart disease need to stay alive and other procedures they undertake, including the pioneering and crucial ECMO service.
